user_question: How can I optimize the energy consumption of my IoT-enabled smart aquarium?
final_answer: To optimize the energy consumption of your IoT-enabled smart aquarium, consider using energy-efficient LED lights, schedule lighting and feeding times, monitor and adjust temperature settings, and use smart plugs to automate device usage.
